    Declaration

    Property Value
    Type Description

    Write(Byte[], Int32, Int32)

    Writes to the buffer.

    Declaration

    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.Byte[] buffer

    The buffer to read from.
    System.Int32 offset

    The zero-based offset at which to start reading.
